summary:
With a +20 year international track record in the energy sector, in commercial roles (with P&L responsibility) and in operational roles, I gained extensive knowledge of and experience in the full energy value chain for gas, power and renewables.

I am a result-oriented executive and experienced consultant who worked for large corporates as well as for privately owned companies. I am recognised for my clear vision and strategic thinking skills, leadership skills and out-of-the-box thinking, my content knowledge and implementation skills.

I am experienced in leading complex change and integrations in challenging environments and under challenging conditions. Areas of expertise include:

•	Content driven leadership.
•	Strategy development & implementation.
•	Change management/business turn around.
•	Business development.
•	Sourcing & Portfolio management.
•	Renewable energy solutions & sustainability.
•	Digital solutions (e.g. using machine learning).
•	Deal structuring & pricing.
•	Data analytics.
•	Risk management (in particular market risk).

profile_positions.description:
Focus on interim management and strategic advisory roles for a variety of international (private) companies.

Key interim Management roles:
•	2022: Arlanxeo - Director Energy - Lead the company through a turbulent 2022 and prepare it for the future.
•	2020-2022: GOPACS - Program Manager - Bring it from start-up to scale-up.
•	2014: Enoi Energie GmbH - MD - Responsible for making the company profitable again.
•	2014: Enoi SpA - Head of Portfolio Management and Origination - Set up these teams.
•	2013: Scholt Energy - Head of the Sourcing, Forecasting and Trading teams.

Independent advisor and mentor roles:
•	2018 - 2019: Senfal - Advisor - Support this scale-up with its further growth & professionalization.
•	2019 - now: UtrechtInc - Mentor - Share my experience & expertise with (tech) start-ups.

Key strategic advisory assignments:
•	Supported with defining & executing its strategy on digital solutions (Alliander).
•	Advised management on its ‘green’ strategy for the Benelux (ENGIE).
•	Evaluated organization and risk policy; proposed key improvements (ENGIE).
•	Led the optimization of biomass supply chains (Peterson Projects).
•	Developed pricing strategies to optimise profitability (Greenchoice, Total).
•	Developed a ‘tailored’ risk management approach (Greenchoice).
•	Developed market entry and business growth strategies (Scholt Energy, Enoi, Naturgy).
•	Developed a renewable (asset) investment strategy (Greenchoice).
•	Developed business plans for the large scale use of biomass steam (Lyondell, Huntsman and AkzoNobel).
profile_positions.title: Independent senior (interim) manager and advisor

profile_positions.description:
Focus of my team were the large B2B/I&C customer segments across all RWE entities. Key objectives: stabilize market shares, improve profitability and share, define and implement best practices in risk reduction.
•	Led a project team with experts from UK, Germany, The Netherlands, Belgium, CZ and Hungary.
•	Additional gross margin of € 15-20 mln p.a. due to the implementation of key changes/improvements.
•	Led to central steering instead of a ‘country level’ approach and steering of the large B2B/I&C segment.
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.description:
This newly formed department aimed at integrating, managing and optimising all Essent’s renewable energy portfolios. This role was combined with the Head of Deal Structuring & Analytics role.
•	Set up, staffed and managed the department (4 FTE).
•	Developed purchase strategy, portfolio & market analysis functions, risk framework and IT systems.
•	Saved sourcing costs of € 2 mln and realised additional gross margin of € 1.5 mln p.a. within two years.
•	Further developed Essent’s wind business and closed large on/off shore PPA's.
profile_positions.title: Head of Renewables

profile_positions.description:
My departments were responsible for pricing and structuring commodities (power and gas), flexibilities and risks. They were also responsible for contracts, market and portfolio analysis and for forecasting.
•	Managed the gas and power pricing, deal structuring, analysis and forecasting teams (4 teams, 4 direct reports, 25 experts).
•	Played a key role in Essent Belgium’s growth strategy, leading to € 5 mln additional gross margin p.a.
•	Set up the interface with processes & systems between RWE Supply & Trade and Essent’s sales channels.
•	Gas and power sourcing/hedging strategies were further improved; leading to slightly higher revenues at significantly lower risk (levels).
•	Developed and lead Essent's structured origination activities.
profile_positions.title: Head of Deal Structuring & Analytics

profile_positions.description:
Integrating Essent into RWE involved setting up a new business unit, Sales Portfolio Management (SPM), which manages Essent’s gas, power and renewables portfolios and ensures maximization of portfolio benefits.
•	End responsible for setting up SPM, including the support functions Risk and Finance (over 100 FTE).
•	Reported directly to the Essent Board and managed the works council involvement.
profile_positions.title: Workstream leader / Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
One of Essent Trading’s core activities was to sell power (25 TWh), gas (10 bcm) and renewables to Essent’s sales channels in The Netherlands and Belgium. Core activity of my department was to manage and optimisme the portfolio’s.
•	Rebuilt the team (8 FTE) and improved the performance of the department’s key activities.
•	Improved pricing/structuring of large power deals: hit rate went up from 5% to 25% within half a year.
•	Gas and power sourcing/hedging strategies were significantly improved.
•	Played a key role in analyzing the market and supporting internal accounts with further developing a competitive range of gas, power and renewables products.
profile_positions.title: Vice President (VP) Energy Portfolio Management

profile_positions.description:
In-house consultancy for Essent aimed at solving strategic issues on board and senior executive level. Key projects:
•	Developed Essent Trading’s policy and strategy on biofuels sourcing and trading.
•	Supported McKinsey in developing Essent’s LNG strategy and Essent Trading’s merchant strategy (regarding the latter: I coordinated the implementation of the new organizational structure and was in charge of setting up the new Global Commodities department).
•	Developed Essent Trading’s strategy on natural gas sourcing and sales.
•	Led the sale of Essent’s Domestic Services (home safety) business unit.
profile_positions.title: Managing Consultant at the Essent Consulting Group

profile_positions.description:
The liberalization of the energy market resulted in several mergers of local energy suppliers and internal business transformations. I was involved in and led several of these. The most important projects:
•	Supported set up of the former energy division and led the integration of sales units (2004 - 2005).
•	Improved the profitability of existing (large) district heating projects (2004).
•	Led several projects to improve B2C customer services (2003).
•	Worked for a year at the 'Amer' (coal/biomass) and 'Claus' (gas) power plants (regarding the latter: as the plant manager's assistant) (2001-2002).
profile_positions.title: (Senior) Project & Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
Member of a project team (Energie Delfland/University of Twente), which developed a large-scale heat and carbon dioxide supply system for 140 greenhouses in the area between Rotterdam and The Hague. As researcher and project engineer, I was responsible for developing, implementing and optimizing the system's process control.

Our work lead to several publications. I am co-writer of the book “Bivalent heat supply to greenhouses” and co-writer of the article “Simulation as a tool for designing connecting stations”.
profile_positions.title: Researcher
